SELECT sp_id,supplier_name, supplier_site, supplier_linkman, supplier_phone, enterprise_category, licence, licence_time, enterprise_linkman, enterprise_phone, manage_scope, registered_address, relation_site, postal_code, total_assets, sobey_fax, legal_person_name, legal_person_number, enterprise_register_capital, last_year_money, email_address, enterprise_url, enterprise_code, enterprise_code_time, business_license, business_license_time, is_letter_of_credit, letter_credit_number, letter_credit_time, fixed_assets, company_profile, company_remarks, creation_time, modification_time FROM supplier
and supplier_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and supplier_linkman LIKE CONCAT("%",#{supplierLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and enterprise_category LIKE CONCAT("%",#{enterpriseCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},"%")
and enterprise_linkman LIKE CONCAT("%",#{enterpriseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and manage_scope LIKE CONCAT("%",#{manageScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and is_letter_of_credit LIKE CONCAT("%",#{isLetterOfCredit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and del_id = 0
